subject: Lesson Report for Lexi (Tue Dec 5, 2023 at 07:00 PM)
body:
Lexi Lessons Report: Tue Dec 5, 2023 at 07:00 PM

Lexi had practiced Jingle Bells! Good for her.

We worked on the melody some.
